name: Hokm King سلطان حکم
description:
Have you ever wanted to play a card game that is both enjoyable and challenging? Want to have some fun playing cards with your friends? Then you should play one of the most popular and challenging card games, Hokm (Court Piece, Rang, Rung) online for free!

As a Hakem (trump-teller) , choose the trump card of the round and work with your teammate to win the most cards. The first team that earns 7 points wins the match! Come up with your best strategy and win the match!


"Hokm King" creates an experience of seamless gameplay with either offline AI or online opponents.
Enjoy the nice features on this top-tier card game:
- Easy, simple, and super engaging gameplay!
- Play with friends!
- Free chat!
- Play online and offline!
-Customize your profile picture
- Customize your card skins and sho other how you are awesome
- Eye catching graphics!
- Keep track of your rank on the leaderboard
- Send stickers and share your feelings in the game.
-Give a gift to your teammates or opponents during gameplay
- Earn weekly rewards
